Title: Bali Ha'i
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Gennifer Hutchison, Ann Cherkis (executive story editor), Gordon Smith (story editor)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Jimmy finds comfort in familiarity; Kim receives a life-changing proposal; when he is threatened, Mike finds himself pushed to the limit.
